content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello, Mr. Abbasi. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. I'm sure you will find it quite comfortable and convenient, given its central location and modern amenities. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay for this lovely one-bedroom apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student, and I am looking for a place that is both affordable and comfortable. I am smart, dependable, and responsible, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I am hoping we can reach an agreement that is fair for both parties. What is your lowest price for this newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your concerns, Mr. Abbasi. As a landlord, I am open to finding a solution that works for both of us. However, I must be honest with you. Given the prime location and the recent construction of the apartment, I am looking to secure a rental price that reflects its value. I am willing to negotiate, but I must also ensure that I am compensated fairly for the investment I have made in this property. Would you be willing to pay a premium for the convenience and quality of this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. As a student, I am on a budget, and while I understand the value of the property, I am looking for the best deal possible. I am willing to pay a fair price for the apartment, but I would appreciate it if you could consider my situation as a student and offer a price that is within my means.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad to hear that you're willing to pay a fair price, Mr. Abbasi. As a landlord, I'm here to provide you with a comfortable living space, and I understand that you're looking for a deal that aligns with your budget. Let's find a balance that satisfies both your needs and my expectations. How much would you say is within your means for this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am prepared to offer 850 Euro per month for this apartment. I believe this is a fair price considering my status as a student and the fact that the apartment is unfurnished. I am also willing to pay a security deposit and sign a one-year lease. I hope this offer meets your expectations.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your offer, Mr. Abbasi. While 850 Euro per month is a fair amount, I must inform you that, based on the current market rates and the exceptional location of the apartment, I was hoping for a slightly higher rent. Would you be willing to consider increasing your offer slightly? Perhaps we can find a number that is more in line with the value of the property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I respect your position and the value of the property. However, as a student, I must remain mindful of my budget. I am willing to increase my offer to 900 Euro per month, which I believe is a fair reflection of the apartment's location and condition. This is my final offer, and I hope it meets your expectations.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your offer of 900 Euro per month is certainly more in line with the value of the property, Mr. Abbasi. It shows that you're serious about securing this apartment. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Would you be willing to go just a bit higher, say 925 Euro per month? This would be my final ask, and I believe it's a fair compromise considering the market rates and the amenities you'll enjoy.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. Your final ask of 925 Euro per month is indeed a fair price, and I am willing to accept this offer. I agree to the price of 925 Euro!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Wonderful news, Mr. Abbasi! I'm delighted to have reached an agreement with you. The apartment will be a fantastic place for you to call home during your studies. Please let me know if you have any questions or require additional information. Once the paperwork is sorted out, I look forward to welcoming you as a tenant. Thank you for choosing my property. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
